text: Agho ghobama kughetsa ukutoghola kwenu kulangusa ka kunogha. Hata nzahabu, iidaha kuhinyika nayo yoghetsighwa ne ghumoto, lelo ukutoghola kwenu chinu chikulu kubita nzahabu, pfipfila kwobamighwa kughetsighwe. Baho mtsotunyighwa, mtsotunitsighwa na mtsotogholighwa ne Imulungu kwa ukutoghola kwenu mne litsuwa lila Yesu Kiristu hatsakutsa.
